channel.title: A simple question. Fast answer please!
channel.description: How do i give bones a function? Like when i press bury it doesn't say: "Nothing Interesting Happend.". But how? And how can i do that if i press read on something that a thing popups with text on it. I mean with: "that thing" that screen that too pop ups when u enter ::commands.

item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

In packet 122, you simply do something like this:

if(itemID == 526) { startAnimation(emotehere, 0); addSkillXP(howmuchexpuwant, statid); deleteItem(526, itemSlot, 1); }
